title: Legend of the Five Rings RPG L5R (almost) Complete-ish
description:
I noticed that on all of the more popular torrent sites, there was a lot of shit missing from the L5R torrents. Decided to collect, sort, and see if I could hunt down some of the missing pieces. I'm pretty sure some of this stuff isn't in any torrents anywhere. Gathered most of the missing stuff from Srcibd, wonderful fa/tg/uys, and the dark corners of the internet.

Enjoy.

:( WHAT IS MISSING :(

2nd Edition - Legend of the Five Rings - LARP (Because no, also, I didn't have it on hand)

2nd Edition - Complete Exotic Arms Guide (there's supposed to be 2 versions of this? I only have one, not sure what the difference is?)

3rd Edition - Emerald Empire: The Legend of the Five Rings Companion (can't find the 3E version of this, lots of people looking for it - if you've got it, upload it)
